result.arabic_text: فَٱتَّخَذَتۡ مِن دُونِهِمۡ حِجَابٗا فَأَرۡسَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡهَا رُوحَنَا فَتَمَثَّلَ لَهَا بَشَرٗا سَوِيّٗا
result.translation: 17. Tokkel is isi maraa kee isi fanat tet qellisa reebu haysitte Qibaada abta waqdi tet able waanamkeh, tokkel jibriil deqsita ni malaykattu tet fanah rubneeh gino как dudda-le seehadaytih weelot weeloysimmi iyyeh teetih yemeete.
